content.detailedDescription:
This is a report of a black helicopter, not a ufo.

1. i was leaving mcminnville, oregon after having lunch at mcmenamin's on may 13, 2016. time was about 3 p.M. i took a wrong turn trying to find access to hwy 5, but eventually found my way back to hwy 18 entrance where it joins stratus ave. once on hwy 18 about 1 mile past stratus avenue i saw the object.

2. the object was just east of me and flying very close--maybe about 50 feet above me. i heard the rotor blade noise. the object was completely black with black-tinted windows against a bright blue sky. 

3. i recognized the object as one of those mysterious black helicopters of the kind that speakers at the ufo festival mentioned. i had thought it would be like in movies, but it was not.  

4. it was a small helicopter with an almost spherical glass cabin. vision was clear, a sunny day. the helicopter was close enough for me to see that there were no markings or identifiers on it at all. it looked like a sloane (per image search). the black helicopter flew from east to west across hwy 18 in a straight path. flight was not fast. in my plane of vision, it was about 75 degrees from south horizon (15 degrees from directly over me). 

5. i laughed when i saw it. i understood what speakers talked about. also, as i was just leaving a ufo festival, the timing of seeing a black helicopter was interesting. maybe men in black did attend the festival. 

6. it flew west. i drove south.
content.summary: I was leaving mcminnville ufo festival. black helicopter with black windows flew over my car.

content.detailedDescription:
I heard a small engine plane, which caused me to look up. the plane sounded close, the usual altitude and familiar to me as a single engine prop. i turned to my left looking up, but the sound was behind me, slightly west. then i turned around almost 180 degrees and looked up a bit higher. i saw a group of objects flying at a very high altitude (very small, but were shaped - not just little dots), in relatively uniform triangle formation.

the individual objects sort of shined, or 'glinted' - reflecting random bright silver/white flashes. i heard no usual jet like sound. i blinked my eyes, still there - grabbed my glasses to see if it was just an anomaly in my vision. i tried to take a picture with my old cell phone, but not sure i could capture anything (will review). they continued in the same direction, very fast but it was apparent to me that these were multiple objects not birds, and sort of moved about loosely within the triangular pattern.

my first impression was "military, new aircraft test flight...", but then i couldn't help thinking to myself this is my first apparently legitimate ufo sighting!
content.summary: Heard a small engine plane, looked up - turned around - saw a bright group of ufo's flying in relatively uniform triangle formation individual objects bright silver/white glinting randomly.

content.detailedDescription: So, i work in saint clairsville, ohio and i live in bellaire, ohio. the night this happened i was driving home. was in a good mood, just finished my shift and was ready to get a shower and go pick up my fiancé from work after, just like any other night. i was almost home, coming up on the bellaire exit from route 7 south. i was almost at the stop light on the exit, when i just happen to take a brief look up at the stop light, and just above the stop light was a few orbs of light hovering high up in the sky above the hillside. it kinda creeper me out, cuz as soon as i had seen it, it had flown away in an instant and left a streak in the sky behind it, looking like a burst of light coming from it. in not exactly sure what it was, i didn't get a good look at it cuz it was the middle of the night at 12:37 in the morning. when i finally did get home, i couldn't get my eyes off the sky hoping that i might see it again. i sat there in my car for about 10 minutes debating on if i should keep it to myself or tell someone, or put this info on here, hoping it may better serve someone else's discovery on the subject. honestly, i never believed that there could be aliens among us or even near us, until i saw that. it made a believer out of me.
content.summary: Hovered for a moment, then flew away.

content.detailedDescription:
After picking up my fiancé from work, around 11:40pm, 
monday, may 16th, 2016, we witnessed two large lights/objects off 
into the distance from the home we rent at the above address. 
initially, neither one of us thought we we witnessing something 
"normal", so we joked about the lights driving up our driveway being aliens, what-have-you. 
upon getting out of the car, we got a better view as to roughly how big
these lights/objects actually were. we started to converse that maybe we 
we're seeing a bonified ufo? there were two lights. one was higher up in the sky
from the one, both were bright, although, the lower light/object seemed the brighter of the two.
the colors were mostly white, with a yellowish-orange. the lights/objects, moved fast! zig-zagged and their lights almost seemed to pulse if that makes sense? they hovered. they moved in a path together and they also hovered almost together (despite the distance between them). they moved in a path and they would completely disappear into thin air! almost as if the lights were turned off/on. i was able to get the one light/object via cell phone video, however, it's dark... but you can still make out what we're both looking at. also, in my video, you can see a cluster of dim lights down in the corner in position to the spherical bright light. that, is a farmhouse, so it puts into perspective just how large this big bright light/object actually was. we are at least, 1 mile or so from that farmhouse. these lights/objects came and went over about a hours time. it did not dawn on me to try to video these phenomena until after we'd watched them in awe for quite some time. did i feel weird about what i saw? sure. i'm a former cop, so for me, even reporting this to your organization doesn't make sense to me, but i know what i saw. i've seen a lot of weird stuff in my day, this takes the cake so-to-speak.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: After picking my fiancé up from work, we witnessed two big, bright lights off in the distance past our home. one light, i got on video.

content.detailedDescription: Driving northbound on m-24 the light first appeared towards the west at 11:00 pm, it seemed to be moving northbound a few degrees when it vanished. only a few minutes or so later, still driving northbound, the light appeared directly behind the car. the light was moving northbound behind us, within a mile or so distance from the car. we turned west to go home and when we got out we could still see the light through the tree-line directly to the east. after a few more minutes it disappeared. we looked at it through binoculars and could make out a clear triangular shape. the object was glowing mostly orange but it would fade into purple. i hand drew a simple map of where the car was moving and where the object was in relation to us. the three stars show the points the object moved to. it began west of m-24, moved over it and slightly to the east before continuing northbound.
content.summary: Triangular orange/purple moving through the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I believe this took place during the first week of august, 2010, possible august 5th or 6th. (i noticed i sent an email to my brother about this on august 6, 2010). i was walking home from ocean park library (2601 main st, santa monica, ca 90405), heading south along 2nd street. the sun was on its way down so i am estimating it may have been about 7pm (as sunset would have been at 7:50pm), but it would have been earlier if it was august 6th, as the library closes earlier on fridays.

still on 2nd street, approximately 2 blocks before my home (3005 main st., santa monica, ca 90405) i happened to look up at a number of birds sitting along a wire stretching between telephone poles. (the birds often due this just prior to sunset.) i saw something quite unusual in the sky behind the birds which i immediately thought perhaps was a rocket from vandenberg air force base, as it is normal to see large contrails of aircraft from vandenberg.(i have never seen a rocket from vandenberg.) it was flying se, steady, smooth, at a good speed.

but almost at once i noticed that the front of this "rocket" did not taper, the object was instead cylindrical in shape. white or gray in color. no wings of any type. some type of vertical marking near the back that was darker in color. the planes from santa monica airport fly quite low when taking off heading west and this was not one of them. i've seen large jets flying se, i assume toward lax, but one can easily see the wings, etc. and of course larger jets can be routinely seen very high up leaving contrails, but they can always be recognized as jets.

i watched this flying cylinder  for a number of more seconds and then it was gone. i don't know what it was. i've since, for the past 6 years, looked up at jets in the sky when i am out walking, and i can always see the wings on them, even when sometimes the wings are barely visible. i have not seen anything like this cylinder again. i have been assuming that with the pending setting of the sun that there must have been an unusual optical illusion that completely hid all wings, tail fins, engines, etc., and made this appear to be a flying cylinder... although it did appear rather clear and distinct to me at the time.

i thought i'd file this report in case there were others that also saw something unusual flying over santa monica/los angeles on the date i mention.

again, it was probably a jet under very unusual optical conditions, or maybe something from vandenberg? but i thought i'd file this nonetheless.

~ niko
content.summary: Cylinder shaped, appeared large, no wings

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch and happened to look up at clouds to see if rain was coming. i saw this object really moving fast between the clouds and in a break in clouds i saw no wings, which caught my attention. at first i heard no sound and then heard a jet but actually figured out the jet was behind me heading east toward asheville,this object was heading southwesterly in a straight path.In the break in clouds i also noticed that the sun was reflecting off of something in middle of craft on the top of it. that got my curiosity and i was looking hard.There then was a large break in the clouds in which the object should, on the same path emerge.But it didn't and i was shocked.I mean this thing was moving fast,this whole sighting lasted about 2 minutes. at this objects flight pattern,a jet,in turning would have come out of the cloud bank,i didn't and still don't know what to think.Sorry but this all happened so fast i didn't have time for pics.All i have is my word.
content.summary: Noticed no wings, long cigar shaped, sun was shining on something in middle and on the top.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and my son and i were watching tv. around eight o' clock
the lights went out for a second and came back on. we went outside and found the street lights toward the east were out.  we looked down to the east to see how far the power was out.  we then saw four blackish red round lights in the sky. they were hovering in an x pattern with the bottom right space was empty. we watched for several minutes. then all four lights went out at the same time. they did not fly off. i had a feeling they were still there. my wife and son went back inside after a few minutes. i stayed outside because i still felt they were there. after a few more minutes, a fifth light appeared to the left. it was low to the ground. then traveled swiftly just above the ground for about two hundred feet. then it flew up at an angle. it stopped precisely in empty space in the x pattern and went out. i watched for another or two, went inside. but i still had the feeling they had left yet.
content.summary: After a power blip,we went outside and found that the street lights were out.  we looked up and saw four round lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed the objects when i merged on i81 northbound in carlisle,pa.
the sun was rising,and at first i thought they were stars,but after driving for approximately 10 minutes,one started moving,and looked like an airplane, except like i said previously, it hadn't moved for ten minutes. it was at that point i pulled over and shot some video and took a few pictures.
i saw 6 objects total, but the camera on my phone was only able to pick up 4 clearly.
after i resumed driving again,the objects that were not moving continued to remain stationary,but as i drove, i passed them as you would a fixed object such as a building. 
there was one still visible in front of me when i arrived at my exit.  i took a still picture of that one.  once i was off of 81 i did not see anything anymore.

your site is only allowing me to upload one picture and no videos. let me know what email address to send everything else to if you are interested in seeing the rest.
content.summary: Viewed stationary objects during my drive home from work

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq, with witness on the phone, by field investigator l.Flechtner on may 18, 2016
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

two years ago while staying in a rv park in texas i experienced 15 to 20 orbs flying  around over my head. they seemed transparent while being white and glowing on the outside. i could see the inside workings which reminded me of a gyroscope with moving parts. it was about 10 pm in the evening, in october. the orbs seemed to be as high as the street lights and 6 or 7 times went high into the sky to a mothership, where they apparently seemed to be fueling up with energy and then coming back down again. i think the mothership was cylinder in shape. i don't think the mothership could  come into our atmosphere.This lasted for 45 minutes. then they disappeared.

also, the same place in texas, i was visited at night by three tall grays. one of the grays was a little shorter then the other two, but they were taller than me.  i woke up and they were standing at the foot of my bed. i don't remember anything after that.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two years ago while staying in a rv park in texas i experienced 15 to 20 orbs flying  around over my head, they seemed transparent while being white glowing on the outside i could see the inside workings which reminded me of a gyroscope with moving parts

content.detailedDescription: I have a question prior to description....Has anyone ever had nasty health problems after being this close to such an object?  i ask this because i have to know what i have been dealing with has a beginning...As i got sick within 3+ weeks of viewing this "v".."fitted chevron",.."boomerang" object.  not for profit or anything like this.  this sighting happened in the late fall of 2008.  i always meant to write the date down...But just have not done so.  i became sick around christmas 2008.  the reason i ask is way back then i started  seeing my doctor for my health...And she asked me if i had been near or involved w/radiation exposure.  i said..Yes...But 30 years ago during cancer therapy.  i never told her about the ufo.  so, has anyone else that has been this close ever reported health problems? my doctor is only stabbing at what is going on with me, and the bottom line is to keep me as comfortable as possible...Till "they" figure out what's going on w/organs and body.  today is wednesday, may 18, 2016 so it's been 8 years +/-.  i can estimate the size, the shape of the fitted chevrons..Repeating a "v" formation and the indents.  i only saw a slight side view, but a good observation of it's bottom side.  when it started it's departure it went through a huge maple tree w/o stirring so much as a leaf, and reappeared on the other side still ascending then disappeared from view.  there was no airmovement when it started to accelerate (it had slowed in front of me...As if it noticed me standing there)..No air movement but an audible "whoosh" was heard. i can picture the design on the v outline.  it did seem to be already transparent in the middle...But hard to say for sure.  perhaps mirrored in the middle...I do not know).  it's the repetitive shapes, making the outer edges remarkable, as if it could "break" apart into smaller renditions of its "v" shape, then perhaps call them all back together to form just one craft.  i did not see this happen, but by the looks of the depressed edging between the shapes..I would not doubt if the craft had this capability.  anyway....Can anyone at your end please say a yes or no regarding health issue due to proximity.  that is all i want to know.  thank you.  if you have questions...First use my email, and then perhaps i will give a phone number. thank you
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Many small identical "vs" fitted together making up a large "v" formation..Large craft made up of lots of little craft...Sort to speak.

content.detailedDescription:
The first time i saw them they appeared at dusk in a line pattern to the north. they flicked on as if by light switch, held for a few seconds then faded out over a few seconds with no change in pattern or movement. no other light sources in the area. this instance was easier to dismiss.

15-20 minutes later of driving i turned east on a dirt road that i am very familiar with and over a clearing to my north saw 3-4 bright lights (much closer, brighter, and lower in the sky than before). i passed in front of some trees and lost sight of them, only to emerge on the other side with nothing there.

i drive these roads very frequently and am very familiar with where yard lights, light towers and other light sources are located. these were unexplainable, even as reflections or lanterns. 

attached are 2 photoshopped images exactly recreating the light intensity and patterns of the 2 sightings. note: the photo was not taken in the spot where i saw the lights, it is purely to illustrate the time of day and pattern/intensity of the lights i observed.
content.summary: 2 sightings within 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was currently attending a.I.C. college in springfield, ma. i was leaving the building from studying late at night. i looked up and observed a large fireball like object leaving a long trail. it seemed to follow the street and was about perhaps 20 feet in the air. it was extremely fast. i followed it with my eyes until it was out of view. this happened very quickly and silently. i'm certain of what i saw. i don't recall if it was fuzzy or had defined borders. i was with a buddy but he was not looking in that direction. 
i exclaimed, "did you see that!"   he said, "no,what?"
i will never forget that night. i think of it daily.
although it happened years ago, it is etched in my mind. i am a scientific person, as i am a doctor. i described the sighting to the best of my ability. i wasn't sure if i should have said round with a tail of light, or fireball, leaving a trail.  both could apply.
i recall it relatively low flying and quite large. very fast! it flew towards the center of springfield, from state street.
although i was required to list the month and day, i don't recall. i just know it was during the school semester.
content.summary: Looked like meteor. bright organge. left long trail. flew path above street very fast

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting on the front porch of my home around 11:00pm on the evening of may 15,2016 having a cigarette, when a bright reddish colored object in the sky caught my attention. at first i thought it may have been the international space station, as i have seen it before. because it did not move i soon realized that was not what it was. it was considerably larger than any star.It hung motionless and silent. as i was watching it, what was clearly an airplane passed at a lower altitude heading south east of the object.The plane's light was flashing red in the expected fashion and soon was gone,but the object remained,not moving and began rotating it's colors(red to purple to green),fading out momentarily from time to time.
   
   i decided this was very unusual so i went inside the house to get my cell phone to take some pictures of it. i took a number of shots back to back every second or so over about a minute.

   i watched it for another couple of minutes and then went into the house and went to bed.It was still in the sky when i went in. i told my fiance about what i had seen the next morning as he was already sleeping. 

   my fiance has downloaded the pictures from the phone and we are sending a slide show of the shots in sequence at 200% magnification.

*note: i have attempted to include the original photos, but there are 17 and your downloading interface won't accept them all. i can email them separately if you wish.

  as well we are sending two maps showing the location and direction of the sighting. as stated in the question form,i am not sure of the objects size or distance,only direction and angle of elevation.

                                           
                                              may 18,2016
content.summary: Bright multi colored object caught my eye while on my porch.Watched, then went in house for camera.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the parking lot of a starbucks in great falls, mt with my wife at around 1:20 pm on may 17th 2016. while she was on the phone with her doctors office i was looking at the half-dozen or so contrails in the otherwise clear sky above me. i noticed one in particular that struck me as odd. while they all appeared to be at between 25-35,000 ft, this one was not breaking up and dissipating like the others. it was stretching out laterally in very definite but fine lines that were getting more pronounced rather then fading away. it was while watching this contrail transform that i noticed a black object appear right where it intersected with a "normal" contrail. at first it did nothing.. just sat there without moving for approximately 30 seconds. it began to do a slow turn to the east, then changed direction basically doing a u-turn until on a heading of approximately 300°. the maneuvers it had performed up to this point i could only describe as that of an airship. turning while maintaining a level attitude without banking as a conventional aircraft would.
during this time i was trying to get my wife's attention who was still on the phone, tapping her on the shoulder and pointing to what i was looking at. the object seemed to be just hanging there which seemed very unusual and i was beginning to realize that what i was watching was not a conventional aircraft.
suddenly it began to move again. it accelerated at an every increasing speed, taking only 2-3 seconds to pass over great falls and beyond the international airport before disappearing from sight behind the starbucks. it was when the object began moving that my wife caught sight of it and watched as it accelerated out of our sight. we both immediately ran to the other side of the building to follow it's path but it had disappeared. she immediately said, "we just saw a ufo". it's speed and noiseless acceleration was obviously unusual enough to her not to question whether or not we had seen something non-conventional but to definitively state so. i should mention that her father was in the usaf and she had grown up in okinawa as well as various us air bases. being in close proximity to malmstrom afb she is used to constant military air traffic of various sorts.
it was the rate of noiseless acceleration which was the most impressive display of flight i have every witnessed. the distance we watched the object cover, from a point roughly above an area called "gibson flats" to a point well past great falls international airport is between 5-6 miles. to cover that in only a few seconds is mind boggling. even if it took 10x as long to cover that distance, it calculates to a speed that i cannot bring myself to accept, though i personally witnessed it.
the best analogy i can come up with is that of a paddle ball. the old kids toy consisting of a wooden paddle with a ball attached by an elasticized string. after hitting the ball and it files horizontally away from the paddle, there is a brief moment where it's flight it stalled and it hangs mid-air before reversing direction and accelerating back toward the paddle holder. it's the return flight of the ball from hanging to acceleration that best describes this objects flight as if tied to a string that was suddenly jerked.
right before the object began to accelerate i reached for my cel phone in order to capture it on video only to find an empty belt holder as minutes before my wife had taken my phone and plugged it into our vehicle charger.
i wanted to grab hers but she was still on the phone with her doctors office. had i known what we were about to witness i would have grabbed it from her.
i continued to watch the sky and note the appearance in size of passenger airliners in the vicinity. we can only estimate that in comparison to the average aircraft at approximately the same altitude that the black triangular object we witnessed would be slightly smaller.
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft maneuvering slowly before accelerating out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were walking up our driveway around 8:45pm, may 14, 2016. it was an extremely quiet night & the sky was still bright. we noticed a really bright stationary steady light (brighter than a planet) in the northeast sky. no other stars or planets were out. it just seemed out of place. it didn't move for about 10minutes (we were trying to figure if it was a planet or space station). also, it was not where a planet would be (calibrated starwalk app to moon & nothing bright should have been there). my husband was caught off guard & mentioned how it was changing colors. then, it disappeared. we looked for it about 2-3 minutes and all of a sudden reappeared in same position (small light that got brighter and brighter until it was as bright as before..And there were no clouds to distort the view), stationary about 1 minute then it started moving northward (to the left) about the speed of a second hand on a watch. it moved, by perception, about 4 inches across sky, then the light just quickly phased out like it had phased in. as soon as it disappeared again my husband saw a pulsating led-like light which flashed 3 times, then paused, and flashed 3 times again (about 3 flashes in 2 seconds) coming thru the trees from southeast toward the west. he mentioned there was a plane coming although there was no noise (we were still looking for the light in the sky). he thought it was a plane until it stopped on our side of the treeline. brilliantly white bright light. then i saw it. it followed right under the top tree line (about 50 ft up). when it got infront of our trees, behind our house, then the lights started  going south to north following our tree line (sometimes a little lower in the tree line and then sometimes a little higher but was never lower than about 50 feet) until it got to the top of our  most northward tallest tree & then disappeared. just 3 flashing-then-pause-then flashing little but amazingly bright led-like white lights. we thought maybe it was a drone but there was absolutely no noise and it was too close into the trees (within the tree limbs). as well, my husband first thought it was an insect because immediately after the flashes, we could see trees and sky but could see not see anything that was making the flashes. yet, we know of no insect that creates led-like syncopated flashing white light.  
please give some rational explanation.
content.summary: Saw a stationary bright light where there should not be a star/planet, then pulsating lights showed up after bright light moved north and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
as an adult - 2 conclusive sightings (to me anyway) 3-4 years ago in the news a satellite was to enter atmosphere and burn up - a day or so off date of the news reported date of the reentry 10pm'ish +- an hour or so on a fall evening became in the mood for a night campfire - sitting out in the backyard saw first, a streaking re-entry type of lightfire streaked into the atmosphere southeastern sky from kings mountain north carolina...Then a 'starlight' in the same direction of whatever just had reentry burn-up started moving rapidly into the exact same sky location of the large streaking white burn, entered straight lined into the atmosphere hovered for an inspection of the area made a u shaped exit path back out of the night sky going straight lined out to just vanish - - then while continuing to look up within a brief minute or two two small jets visible by faint lighting flying like normal jet fighter size planes came from the north and circled into the exact same sky location traveling normal airplane sky sighted speeds turning back north left.... my conclusions are of a something re-entering burning up then ufo reconnaissance to check the area then normal military jet fighters a few moments later doing the same.

second sighting - looking slightly north of west about the same time of night a few days past the reentry sighting the exact same thing except there was no reentry burn of an object or mil reconnaissance - just the ufo entry and u path atmosphere exit - why shown this man twice? not sure, not sure - were they just man-made ufo's? possibly thats what i think about them anyhoo!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: U flight patterns twice over home

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up from a dream and at about the same time my wife's alarm goes off, the time is 3:20 am. my wife gets out of bed to get ready for work. i'm laying in bed and notice this low frequency, slowly pulsing kind of humming sound.. at first i thought it might be highway  noise as we live close to an interstate, but the noise continued. i get up and look out our bedroom window which faces west and i notice what looks like a very yellow colored sphere like object .
the object was above my neighborhood and heading slowly in a westerly direction.
the humming noise gradually disappeared as the object dropped below the tree line.
content.summary: Yellow sphere like object with low pulsating hum over my neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: This is the 4th ufo i've witnessed, 1 in 1981, 1 in 2005, 1 in 2014, and 1 just now. i am a licensed private pilot, who loves aviation, so my eyes are always turned skyward. i was in my house just now, at 3:02 am, and i heard a helicopter flying over my house very loud. after it passed over my house about 5 times, my curiosity got the best of me and i went out to my back yard and using my night vision scope, i saw it was a bell jetranger iii helicopter flying in circles of a diameter of about 1 mile. each time it came around, it passed directly over my house at an altitude of approximately 700 to 900 feet. the sky was completely clear, moonlit, with no clouds or haze. i sat in my lawn chair and watched the bell fly over approximately 20 times. i blinked a flashlight at him during his final few passes and he responded on only one of those times by flashing his red and green navigation lights on and off 3 blinks. i thought that was pretty cool! i watched him pass over from east to west and continue his usual circle to my north. as i watched him come around to the east and begin to approach my house again, i noticed a glowing orange light, which appeared very high in the sky, about 3 or 4 times the size of mars, slightly northeast of directly above me. for an instant i thought "man, that's a huge star!" but then i realized it was glowing orange and moving at a high rate of speed. if you've ever seen a jetliner at 32,000 feet leaving a white contrail in the sky, this object was traveling about 5 times faster than that... very slow compared to a shooting star, but very fast compared to a jetliner at altitude, or any military jet for that matter. the object was silent and left no visible trail that i could distinguish. the object had no red and green navigation lights, no flashing white strobe lights, and no rotating red marker beacons, so i know it wasn't an airplane... at least not one from earth. if the object was huge, then it was way higher than a jetliner's 32,000 foot cruising altitude... maybe even in space. if the object was small, it may have been only a few hundred feet off the ground... well above the trees. i don't know it's exact altitude, because i don't know it's exact size. all i'm certain of is that it was a glowing orange light that was moving very fast! it moved in a direction of approximately 80 degrees, so east-northeasterly. i watched it until it was out of sight near the east-northeast horizon. it was in my unobstructed view for about 30 seconds, moving in a straight line. i don't think it had anything to do with the helicopter, and i don't think the helicopter pilot (pilots) would have seen it or even been aware of it. what i mean is... i don't think the helicopter was there looking for the ufo. i think i just happened to be outside looking up and enjoying a helicopter when a ufo happened to fly by very high in the sky. the helicopter made two more circles over my house before i saw it return to the st. paul downtown airport, which is about 1-1/2 miles north of my house. so i came inside and was marveling at what i had just seen and then i thought "i wonder if that was the international space station?" so i went online and saw that at 3:02 am, the iss was at 41.64 north by 15.22 west, which is about 10 miles off the west coast of spain. i'm calling this a ufo because it was an object, it was flying, and it was unidentifiable by me, a trained pilot, as being any sort of aircraft i have ever seen flying at night, and because it was moving incredibly fast! i don't think it was a satellite because i've seen many satellites moving through the night sky throughout the years, and they all appear brighter white... lit by the sun, and much slower as they move through space. this object was glowing orange and moving fast!
content.summary: Orange glowing light, noiseless, very high, very fast, guess 2500mph

content.detailedDescription: At around 11:20 my girlfriend and i went outside of her house to smoke a cigarette. she lives in the country and we have a very clear vision of the sky with few obstructions and little light pollution. the lights immediately drew my eye. i pointed them out to her and we continued to observe the objects for around five minutes until they disappeared. at first i could see a few blinking lights over the horizon north-northwest of our location. more appeared, in total there were about seven or eight of them. they looked nothing like a plane, there were several planes out before during and after the event. the lights flashed with no apparent pattern and they moved in a non linear path. we could not see the objects except for when they were flashing as it was dark and so were they. the objects would sometimes stay in the same spot, and sometimes dark forwards and backwards. planes do not backtrack.. their flight path was southbound, they disappeared over the tree line to the southwest of us. when all the objects were in our vision the distance between the first and last one spanned almost the entirety of our vision. as they moved south-southwest we lost sight of them in the trees, however the last two were still in our vision. we continued to observe them but instead of disappearing from our vision like the others over the trees, the last two just stopped blinking and we lost sight. we both felt mystified by this event as these objects didnt look like anything we had ever seen. these were not planes, their flight patters did not line up and also the lights didnt look like plane lights, they flashed randomly and the last two we saw turned off, something a plane wouldnt do. these objects moved too fast to be drones. they were miles away and covered one end of the horizon to the other in a matter of minutes. they were in and out of the cloud line.
content.summary: 7-8 randomly flashing lights in loose formation moving across horizon, moved erratically.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been having recurring dreams and nightmares about ufos and alien abductions. this one that i'm reporting is the most recent. i was at home at night dreaming around 3 am around april 15 2016. 
i dreamt was at my father's house in a cattle ranch. i dreamt i saw a gray or silver ufo flying above my head around 30-40 feet in the air traveling north or west. it had a whirring sound as it flew and was dome shaped. i felt excited and happy seeing a ufo.
i then took out my cell phone and took a picture of it with my phone and felt even more excited and happy that i had actual physical proof. i then put the phone on a tree branch.
then after the ufo left, a black or gray helicopter landed on the ground and i automatically knew it was the men in black. a man and woman in black came out of the helicopter. i felt nervous at this point
they looked like normal people with black suits, black ties and black shoes. but they weren't wearing hats or sunglasses and didn't look weird. the man was maybe 45-55 and the woman was maybe 50-60. the man in black told me to give him my cell phone.
i then went to the tree where my cell phone was and noticed he was pulling out his neuralyzer and sunglasses about to neuralyze me. i got scared, went to the man in black, yanked the sunglasses off his face and put them on me. i then yanked the neuralyzer out of his hand and neuralyzed the man in black making him forget 30-40 years of his life.
then it showed then man in black sitting at a playground with 10 year olds. he was wearing his usual government suit and had a big grin on his face as if he was daydreaming and happy what he was thinking about. 
then i woke up scared.
content.summary: Gray ufo flying north maybe 30 feet above my head.

content.detailedDescription: Lido beach golf course one other witness to the sound, like a small fighter craft from star wars the shocking like a jet 20' above my head at 215 pm whizzed past i first thought ido then thought meteor lido beach golf course is in south nassau county long island town of hempstead, if anyone knows of a event to coincide with this report day n time please advise
content.summary: On golf course 18 th hole lido beach middle of fareway very overcast direct overhead sound like the small fighter craft from star wars i ducked under the cart very loud i am retired nyc correction officer don't scare easy this was something i never exper

content.detailedDescription: I just noticed the ufo when i checked the picture that i had just taken of my brothers at boston downtown. at that moment, we looked to the sky and saw nothing.
content.summary: I noticed the ufo when i saw the picture i took

content.detailedDescription: Caso ufo no brasil. gostaria de compartilhar com uma experiência que ocorreu em palmas-to em 2005. por volta da 00h, 1h da madrugada do sabado, eu estava com meu vizinho sentados na porta de casa, quando passou sobre o céu da cidade um objeto luminoso em baixa altitude e se chocou na serra fazendo um clarão muito forte. pela manhã "toda a cidade" percebeu a presença de dois caças sobrevoando o espaço aéreo, e no jornal local de meio dia, nos foi informado que um meteorito caiu na cidade a noite e por isso a base militar de anápolis-go enviou 2 caças para investigar. (e esses caças chegaram a palmas em 20 minutos, de 800km de distancia, tamanha a urgência). eu tinha 16 anos na época e nao me importava com esses assuntos, até que o mais estranho aconteceu. na manha da segunda feira o despertador do meu celular me acordou as 6h da manha, quando eu fechei o aplicativo do despertador. apareceu imediatamente o aplicativo de gravação de voz que foi aberto anteriomente. havia uma gravação feita as 5:20h da manhã ( 40 minutos antes do despertador tocar). esse gravador de voz é como o whatszapp, de modo que so realiza a gravação enquanto se está pressionando o botão. pois bem, a única explicação normal, é que 3 seres invadiram meu condomínio, minha casa, entraram no meu quarto (trancado) sem qualquer sinal de arrombamento. sem acordar meus pais no quarto ao lado, e deixaram algo gravado no meu celular e desapareceram. pois bem, o conteúdo era o seguinte, nitidamente se percebe uma conversa entre 3 seres. 2 proximos ao celular, e um terceiro falando de dentro do banheiro ( mais ao fundo no audio). a gravação tem 3 minutos e 50segundos. e a comunicação dos seres se parece com rosnados e grunhidos e gargarejos. ( e além dos grunhidos fortes, eles fizeram uma bagunça no banheiro derrubando varias coisas no chão). eu e todos da casa permanecemos dormindo apesar dos fortes barulhos. mostrei a gravaçao para várias pessoas, tenho muitas testemunhas, porém devido a repercussão negativa eu me afastei do assunto. espero que leiam e continuem com o bom trabalho. obrigado
content.summary: I saw a fallen blue star, in the next day militarys airplanes in the city, next day a unknow message in my cellphone with 4min of duration

content.detailedDescription: As reported to asd by phone (the witness is now 96 years old and seems to be very sharp): "i live outside piedmont, missouri on a farm that has been in the family since the 1850's. i lived there with my mother, father, grandmother, and siblings. when i was a kid, whoever was the youngest had to sleep on the sleeping porch of the house. none of us wanted to sleep there because the "little people" would visit and we were all afraid of them. i remember that my mother and grandmother told stories about the little grey people who visited the farm at night and that the stories were in the family since before the civil war. one night in particular, when i was 10 years old, i was laying in bed on the porch and i saw a grey being with big eyes walk up to the window and look inside at me. i was frozen in fear. he just kept looking at me. the next thing i knew, there were three of them, all about 4' tall with no hair, big black eyes, small nose and mouth, and thin, standing next to my bed, and i remember thinking that i had no idea how they got inside. i was even more afraid and wanted to pull the covers up over my face but couldn't. i don't know what happened after that. the next morning i woke up and they were gone. they never appeared during the day, only at night. i never saw a craft of any type, but sometimes late at night we would hear a humming sound coming from the low depression area around the pond about 100 feet from the house, but never went to look to see what it was. i think we were afraid to. we also often saw small white balls of light in the yard and around the farm at dusk and after dusk but never knew what they were. the lights were about the size of a softball. the whole family was sure to be inside after dark and we just didn't play outside after dark - the older family members made sure we came inside and as i think back on this it must have been because of the little people who would "take" us. that is the term my mother and grandmother used - the would say that the little grey people would take us at night but always brought us back before morning. it was almost like talking about fairies or something magical that was our little secret. it was not something we spoke about to other people - we kept it to ourselves and still do to this day. i still see them sometimes, only inside the house where i sleep now. i see them come in late at night, usually around 3:00 a.M. but for some reason i just fall asleep and don't remember any interaction with them. i don't let anyone sleep on the porch, though. my children and grandchildren have also seen the grey people. we are not so afraid of them anymore, just look at them as being visitors rather than something that will harm us. i don't want any publicity or anyone to know who i am because they'll think i'm nuts, but i'm not. i may be old, but i am strong and take care of myself, and have all my faculties"
content.summary: I saw small grey creatures come in the porch in 1930 when i was 10 years old and the family said that had been happening since the 1850's

content.detailedDescription: One moring around 10.30 my wife an i were hanging out some lorndy an i was up a piece of loundry an i append to look up a need this long white cigar shape obeyed going from left to right and i turn to my wife an said her name joann so i said no look at that we just seen a url an said man is cool an we look at it unwell it got of site i was so cool i always say seeing is believing .An that is not the first time i seen a ufo some time back my wife an i were going to work ani was drifting our van an happens o look out the window up into the sky an seen a big silver ball floowing a big jet i do believe in ufo it's true we or not alone.L can't date to see more i look up into the sky every chance i get no matter were i.M 6
content.summary: Long cigar tipe going west to east very slow no sound

content.detailedDescription: Left for work as usual at around 230 monday morning. driving near airport, looked up and saw a bright light orange light similar to the size of a full moon when it seems to be its largest hovering in sky. my depth perception could have been off by the object appeared to be above the radio towers on mt uncamoonuc. instead of seeing the object fly away, the size of the light shrunk until i could no longer see it. it was a very quick event but nothing that i had ever seen before.
content.summary: Witnessed large light orange object in sky over radio towers

content.detailedDescription: I recently went on a family vacation with my father and children to the grand teton mountains in wyoming.  while looking through some photos and videos i found things i cannot explain.  i have attached the files in question and wanted an expert opinion.  i have named the videos with the time you can see the anomaly(s). in the second (as i have named the photos as  such) these objects whiz by so fast that even in the same secnd it is there and then gone.  i only noticed the first frame with the moose and then started to look at the videos in 1/4 second time, frame by frame and found these.  i have never seen anything move so fast it makes no sense. i have also attached a photo with something weird in the background.  i literally took a quick shot of both sides of the bridge we were on and didnt even look at it until recently. please let me know if i am going crazy or if there is something behind these photos/videos.  thank you for your time and help.
content.summary: In each frame they move so fast behind mountains/trees then dissapear. photo shows over trees in grand teton mountains

content.detailedDescription: Hovering white light, did not move.  bigger than any white light ever observed in the area.Was not an aircraft or like any other man-made craft i have observed.
content.summary: Hovering white light, did not move.  bigger than any white light ever observed in the area.

content.detailedDescription: My buddy (we'll call him jack) and i were sitting outside on his front porch when we saw a black helicopter go through the sky. we didn't think anything of it until we saw some sort of triangular object with constant white lights on the underside of it come out of nowhere. as jack was lighting up a cigarette, this triangle slows down and stops almost directly over us. it stayed there for about thirty seconds before it took off in the direction of the helicopter. just before this object took off, there was a bright light that blinded us for about twenty seconds.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: It flew over us slowly and hovered over the house for about thirty seconds and left
